DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the disease progression in CHB/NAFLD compared with CHB and NAFLD including liver cirrhosis, cirrhotic complications and hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up of Chronic Hepatitis B Patients With Comorbid Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease
DOC.criteria: Liver biopsy proved CHB and/or NAFLD at baseline; Chinese Followup duration>12 months Other liver diseases; Secondary causes of hepatic steatosis; Alcohol abuse; Liver cirrhosis, cirrhosis related complications or HCC at baseline; Malignancy; History of liver transplantation
